Description: Available Now, 8/1 or 9/1- Furnished rooms available for rent in 5 bed/ 2 bath house, walking distance to Boston College B Line T stop, great restaurants and shops! Rent includes all utilities, internet, laundry and basic bedroom furniture. Features include: laundry in unit, dishwasher, and hardwood floors. Flexible lease terms. No living room. Parking available for $150 per month. Transportation: - Train: Boston College B Green Line - Easy access to Storrow Drive, Memorial Drive, and I-90
